translation.en: -[screeching] -[howling]
[BTG] Curious allies, zebra and ostrich tolerate each other
translation.it: Strani alleati, zebre e struzzi si tollerano a vicenda

translation.en: to avoid hungry predators.
The zebra relies on the ostrich's height and huge eyes,
translation.it: La zebra sfrutta l'altezza e gli occhi enormi dello struzzo,

translation.en: which are larger than an elephant's, to see hidden dangers,
translation.it: più grandi di quelli di un elefante, per scorgere i pericoli,

translation.en: while the ostrich depends on the zebra's superb sense of smell.
translation.it: mentre lo struzzo si affida all'eccellente olfatto della zebra.

translation.en: Easy, buddy.
Just a friendly ostrich casually probing your anus for fecal parasites.
translation.it: Sono solo uno struzzo che cerca parassiti fecali nel tuo ano.

translation.en: -[Dietrich] Bees! -[braying]
Oh no. [screams]
[groans] Buttocks.
-[bees buzzing] -Hypodermic needles with wings.
They're gonna give me hepatitis!
-Bees can't give you hepatitis, Dietrich. -How do you know, Bonnie?
translation.it: - Non si prende dalle api, Dietrich. - Che ne sai, Bonnie?

translation.en: -I guess I don't. -Well, I-- [gasps]
translation.it: - In effetti non lo so. - Io…

translation.en: -I hate nature so much right now. -[scoffs]
Dietrich, when I'm elbow-deep in a zebra's anus,
translation.it: Quando ho il braccio nell'ano di una zebra,

translation.en: I need you to keep it down, okay?
Ten years as my field assistant, I'm surprised you don't know that.
translation.it: Dopo dieci anni da assistente, mi sorprende che tu non lo sappia.

translation.en: I do know that,
but I've also seen hateful bees sting you so many times
translation.it: ma ho visto le api pungerti così tante volte

translation.en: your skin looked like pre-chewed gum.
Ha! That was such a great day.
[inhales deeply] Still not sure why you'd carry that photo around.
translation.it: Ma perché hai con te quella foto?

translation.en: I've got one too, Uncle B.
From when you brought a Tasmanian devil to my sixth birthday party.
translation.it: Di quando mi hai portato un diavolo della Tasmania.

translation.en: [BTG] Oh yes.
[laughs] Good times!
You really need to embrace nature's wonders and horrors.
translation.it: Devi accogliere le meraviglie e gli orrori della natura.

translation.en: Just try to be more like Bonnie.
But this is her first expedition. She should be more like me.
translation.it: Ma è la sua prima spedizione. Lei dovrebbe essere più simile a me.

translation.en: [shrieks] I'm not vaccinated!
Don't worry! I've been prepping for this expedition my entire life.
translation.it: Tranquillo! Mi preparo per questa spedizione da tutta la vita.

translation.en: I've got everything.
GPS, bug spray, tranquilizer gun, an apple--
translation.it: GPS, spray anti-insetti, pistola tranquillante, mela…

translation.en: No guns.
Incoming wounded!
Those animals!
-Keep your whiskers up, sunshine. -[tiger growls]
Lieutenant Greive,
did you bring a tiger to the medical tent again?
translation.it: ha portato un'altra tigre nella tenda?

translation.en: It's an Indochinese tiger, sir. They're almost extinct.
translation.it: Tigre indocinese, signore. Sono quasi estinte.

translation.en: Bah! Do you know how many signs I had to commission because of you?
translation.it: Sa quanti cartelli ho dovuto far fare per colpa sua?

translation.en: That's my ex-wife, Linda. Can't be too careful.
translation.it: È la mia ex moglie, Linda. Non posso rischiare.

translation.en: -[bombs exploding] -You're my best paratrooper commander
translation.it: Lei è il mio miglior comandante dei paracadutisti

translation.en: and the only decent baritone in the officers' a cappella group,
translation.it: e l'unico baritono decente nel coro degli ufficiali,

translation.en: but you have to make a choice.
Are you gonna be part of this regiment, or are you gonna play with wild animals?
translation.it: Vuole far parte del reggimento o giocare con gli animali?

translation.en: The animals need me more.
translation.it: Gli animali hanno più bisogno di me.

translation.en: Ah, that Bradley Trevor Greive is a magnificent lunatic.
translation.it: Quel Bradley Trevor Greive è un magnifico pazzo.

translation.en: How long do you think he can maintain that incredible physique?
translation.it: Per quanto riuscirà a mantenere quel fisico incredibile?

translation.en: Um… You were saying?
[BTG] Rule number one of Greive expeditions.
If you need a gun to feel safe in the wild, you don't belong out here.
translation.it: Se ti serve una pistola per sentirti al sicuro, non venire qui.

translation.en: Stay home.
Wait, what?
I thought rule number one of Greive expeditions was never try to save you.
translation.it: Pensavo che la prima regola fosse non provare a salvarti.

translation.en: Correct, you should never try to save me. There are two rule number ones.
translation.it: Esatto, non provate mai a salvarmi. Ci sono due prime regole.

translation.en: Excellent.
The last animals in a parasite census
are always the most rewarding.
You two, stay here and, uh, practice your tweezer technique.
translation.it: Voi due restate qui e fate pratica con le pinzette.

translation.en: Yes! Something in my comfort zone.
translation.it: Sì! Qualcosa con cui sono a mio agio.

translation.en: Watch and learn, Bonnie.
[scoffs] Oh my God.
Don't you get bored watching BTG do all the fun stuff?
translation.it: Non ti annoi a guardare BTG che si diverte?

translation.en: This feces is chock-full of amazing parasites.
translation.it: Queste feci sono piene di fantastici parassiti.

translation.en: Other than the birth of my daughter, this is the best day of my life.
translation.it: È il più bel giorno della mia vita dopo la nascita di mia figlia.

translation.en: Um, my idea of fun is a little different.
You ever play Mahjong?
So exciting!
I stay awake at night dreaming of chows, pongs, and kongs.
translation.it: Resto sveglio la notte a sognare chow, pong e kong.

translation.en: Look, something's in those bushes.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa tra i cespugli. Vediamo.

translation.en: -We should check it out. -Are you nuts? Fine, I'll check it out.
Just stay here and practice your tweezering.
translation.it: Resta qui e fai pratica con le pinzette.

translation.en: Listen to me.
Every field assistant BTG's ever had died a horrible death.
translation.it: Ogni assistente sul campo di BTG è morto in modo orribile.

translation.en: I actually saw one get nature-murdered on my very first day.
translation.it: Ne ho visto uno ucciso dalla natura il mio primo giorno.

translation.en: I was a free-spirited grad student with washboard abs and perfect skin
translation.it: Ero uno studente dallo spirito libero con addominali e pelle perfetti

translation.en: on a research trip.
-[screaming] -BTG had plunged into the open sea
translation.it: BTG si era tuffato in mare aperto

translation.en: to tag a shortfin mako shark with his field assistant, Ulrich.
translation.it: per marcare uno squalo Mako con l'assistente Ulrich.

translation.en: Shark monster!
-[grunts] -Are you done? Good.
We need to head back.
Ulrich's been attacked by a shark, but he should be…
translation.it: Ulrich è stato morso da uno squalo, ma…

translation.en: Oh, that's not good.
Oh my God! Ulrich!
-[retches] -Did you just cough up a hot dog?
I don't chew properly when I'm stressed.
Ah, no shame in that.
Sharks vomit up entire meals to distract larger sharks from eating them.
translation.it: Gli squali vomitano interi pasti per distrarre gli squali più grandi.

translation.en: Mmm! Wow. Dietrich, I have good news. Mmm!
You are my new field assistant.
translation.it: Tu sei il mio nuovo assistente sul campo.

translation.en: What? Me?
But I'm only here for three days for college credit.
translation.it: Sono qui solo tre giorni per avere i crediti.

translation.en: I don't wanna be a field zoologist.
I wanna be a zoology professor at UC Davis.
translation.it: Voglio insegnare zoologia alla UC Davis.

translation.en: Mmm, don't worry, this is gonna be great for your career. [munches]
translation.it: Tranquillo, sarà ottimo per la tua carriera.

translation.en: Or you'll die.
Either way, it's a step forward, so congratulations.
translation.it: Comunque sarà un passo avanti, congratulazioni.

translation.en: Okay. [inhales deeply]
Let's tag another shark while there's still so much blood in the water.
translation.it: Marchiamo un altro squalo finché c'è sangue nell'acqua.

translation.en: Oh, goodbye, Ulrich.
You were a great field assistant.
translation.it: Eri un grande assistente sul campo.

translation.en: One of the best.
In you go!
That was ten years ago,
making me BTG's longest surviving field assistant
translation.it: quindi sono l'assistente più longevo di BTG

translation.en: by nine years and six months.
translation.it: per nove anni e sei mesi.

translation.en: You know how I managed to survive all that time, Bonnie?
translation.it: Sai come sono sopravvissuto così a lungo?

translation.en: I never do anything.
Oh, hello!
Aren't you a cute little furry thing?
Bonnie! Back to the jeep!
It's my lucky day!
Bonnie! Bonnie!
-Over here! -[snarling]
Crap!
No, no, no, no, no! [pants]
Help! The headlights won't turn on!
translation.it: Aiuto! I fari non si accendono!

translation.en: [grunts] Good thinking, Dietrich!
Bonnie, listen to me.
You need to stay with the herd to be protected.
translation.it: Devi stare con il gruppo per proteggerti.

translation.en: Loners get picked off.
I thought I saw danger. Turns out I was right.
translation.it: Avevo visto un pericolo. E avevo ragione.

translation.en: There were lions.
You're not in a classroom now. This is the wild.
translation.it: Non sei più in classe. Questa è la natura selvaggia.

translation.en: I need you to hang back, observe and learn.
Ugh! But you've been telling me that my entire life.
translation.it: Ma me lo dici da tutta la vita.

translation.en: -Now can I go into the field with you? -[slurping]
translation.it: Posso venire sul campo con te?

translation.en: No, Bonbon. [chuckling] You're too young. [slurping]
Now can I go into the field with you?
translation.it: Posso venire sul campo con te?

translation.en: No, Bonnie, you need more training.
translation.it: No, Bonnie, ti serve più pratica.

translation.en: Now can I go into the field with you?
translation.it: Posso venire sul campo con te?

translation.en: No, Bonnie! You're too…
Hang on.
Hello? Mrs. Peterson?
Yes, thanks for calling. I'm sorry, I've… I've got to take this.
translation.it: Sì, grazie per aver chiamato. Scusa, dovevo rispondere.

translation.en: You're talking into a banana!
I'm a grown woman, Uncle B.
If you really want me to learn, you're gonna have to let me get hurt.
translation.it: Se vuoi che impari, devi lasciare che mi faccia male.

translation.en: [BTG] So, I'm a little overprotective.
-[huffs] -It's an ambush!
Look at that bird! He's the brains of the operation.
Sorry, big fella. That's just a cattle egret.
translation.it: Scusa, amico. È solo un airone guardabuoi.

translation.en: The Cape buffalo tolerates the egret because it eats parasites and insects off his skin.
translation.it: Il bufalo del Capo lo tollera perché mangia i parassiti sulla sua pelle.

translation.en: Easy meal for the bird, good hygiene for the buffalo.
translation.it: Cibo per l'uccello, igiene per il bufalo.

translation.en: I love animal friends that shouldn't be friends.
translation.it: Adoro gli animali che sono amici e non dovrebbero.

translation.en: One time, I saw a video of a bear who was friends with a duck.
translation.it: Ho visto un video di un orso amico di un'anatra.

translation.en: Yeah, I saw that video.
I'm pretty sure those animals were drugged.
translation.it: Sono abbastanza certo che fossero drogati.

translation.en: -[groans] -Anyway, I wouldn't call them friends,
more like a mutualistic relationship where each benefits from the other.
translation.it: è un rapporto mutualistico in cui ognuno sfrutta l'altro.

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah. They're BFFs.
If it looks like a duck and sounds like a duck-- Crows sound like ducks.
translation.it: - Se sembra un'anatra… - I corvi a volte sembrano anatre.

translation.en: -Would you say that we're friends? -Not now, Dietrich. Look!
translation.it: - Noi siamo amici? - Non ora, Dietrich. Guardate!

translation.en: -[buffalo chuffing] -[BTG gasps] Black gold.
This is gonna be a parasite bonanza!
-[bellows gently] -Don't mind me.
All we need to find now is a mountain nyala,
translation.it: Ora manca solo un nyala di montagna,

translation.en: the pride of Ethiopia.
Ah! There's nothing quite as invigorating as a good parasite census.
translation.it: Nulla è più corroborante di un bel censimento dei parassiti.

translation.en: Have you ever tried recreational drugs? Because I have news for you.
translation.it: Hai mai provato la droga? Perché ho una notizia per te.

translation.en: Inappropriate uncle talk, Bonnie.
translation.it: Non sono cose da dire allo zio.

translation.en: But, yes, I once licked a Sonoran Desert toad,
translation.it: Ma sì, una volta ho leccato un Incilius alvarius,

translation.en: but this is better.
Big b-buffalo b-back-o!
-[jeep crashing] -Oh no! Uncle B!
Give it up, Bonnie.
BTG's dead.
You're a Greive,
and your initials are BTG, which means you can legally sign my paychecks,
translation.it: e le tue iniziali sono BTG, quindi puoi firmare i miei assegni

translation.en: and, also, that makes you next in line to lead the Greive expeditions, right?
translation.it: e sarai anche la prossima a guidare le spedizioni Greive, giusto?

translation.en: Um… Yeah. Yes. I… I guess so.
Well, congratulations, Dietrich, you're my new field assistant.
translation.it: Beh, congratulazioni, Dietrich, sei il mio nuovo assistente sul campo.

translation.en: Wha… What? Me?
Oh God!
-Did I even graduate college? -Come on.
translation.it: - Ho almeno finito il college? - Andiamo.

translation.en: Uncle B! Uncle B!
Ah. Crap. There's no sign of him.
translation.it: Cavolo. Non c'è traccia di lui.

translation.en: Uncle B!
Not dead yet.
Back off! I'm not being eaten alive beneath the jeep.
translation.it: Sciò! Non sarò mangiato vivo sotto una jeep.

translation.en: That's what happened to my old field assistant, Bardrich.
translation.it: È successo al mio vecchio assistente Bardrich.

translation.en: Fifty thousand social spiders working together built that collective super web.
translation.it: Cinquantamila ragni sociali hanno creato quella ragnatela collettiva.

translation.en: Their cooperation allows them to capture far larger prey
translation.it: Collaborando possono catturare prede molto più grandi

translation.en: than any single spider could ever dream of.
translation.it: di quanto un singolo ragno possa sognare.

translation.en: Pretty cool, right, Bardrich?
I'm not Bardrich. My name's Emmerich.
translation.it: Non sono Bardrich. Mi chiamo Emmerich.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. What happened to Bardrich?
translation.it: Oh, scusa. Cos'è successo a Bardrich?

translation.en: -I love my job! I love my life! -[grunting ferociously]
translation.it: Amo il mio lavoro! Amo la mia vita!

translation.en: Oh, right.
Well, anyway, you get my point, right, Emmerich?
translation.it: Beh, comunque hai capito, vero, Emmerich?

translation.en: Wow, that's the quickest one yet.
translation.it: Wow, è durata meno di tutti.

translation.en: -[cawing] -I refuse to be a Bardrich.
translation.it: Mi rifiuto di essere un Bardrich.

translation.en: For the last time, Dietrich, there is no such thing as mountain crocodiles.
translation.it: Per l'ultima volta, Dietrich, non esistono i coccodrilli di montagna.

translation.en: -Bonnie! -[Bonnie gasps]
Yes! I knew you weren't dead!
translation.it: Sì! Sapevo che non eri morto!

translation.en: Or are you a zombie?
You just emerged from the earth, and your face is bloated and disgusting.
translation.it: Sei uscito dalla terra e la tua faccia è disgustosa.

translation.en: Thank God! Someone who actually knows something.
translation.it: Grazie a Dio! Qualcuno che sa davvero qualcosa.

translation.en: Are mountain crocodiles a thing?
In the Cardamom Mountains of Cambodia? Yes!
translation.it: Sui Monti Cardamomi in Cambogia? Sì!

translation.en: I knew it! I'm never listening to Bonnie again.
translation.it: Lo sapevo! Non ascolterò mai più Bonnie.

translation.en: [scoffs] Son of a…
-[wolves calling] -Uh-oh. Ethiopian wolves.
Here, put these on.
[Dietrich] Monkey suits?
It's finally happened. BTG's gone insane.
translation.it: Alla fine è successo. BTG è impazzito.

translation.en: [BTG] Ethiopian wolves could eat young gelada monkeys,
translation.it: I lupi etiopi possono mangiare i babbuini gelada,

translation.en: but instead of fighting and getting hurt, they choose to hunt together.
translation.it: ma invece di combattere e farsi male, scelgono di cacciare insieme.

translation.en: The monkeys expose small rodents while digging up tubers and plant shoots.
translation.it: I babbuini trovano piccoli roditori mentre dissotterrano tuberi e germogli.

translation.en: An easy meal for the wolves and added protection for the monkeys.
translation.it: Cibo facile per i lupi e maggiore protezione per i babbuini.

translation.en: -[snarling] -Classic mutualism.
You mean, animal friends that shouldn't be friends?
translation.it: Animali che sono amici e non dovrebbero?

translation.en: Sort of like… us?
Sure.
Trusted friends, temporary colleagues. Well, whatever.
translation.it: Amici fidati, colleghi temporanei. Beh, quello che è.

translation.en: Those wolves do not wanna be this far down the mountain.
translation.it: Quei lupi non dovrebbero stare a così bassa quota.

translation.en: -[animal growling] -Uh-oh. In fact…
Go ahead, lion. Finish what you started.
translation.it: Avanti, leone. Finisci ciò che hai iniziato.

translation.en: [Bonnie] Uncle B!
Rule number one!
Which rule number one?
-[groaning] Get up that tree! Now! -[growling]
[BTG] Back here, lions.
-I'm your main course! -[snarling]
[laughs] And probably dessert as well, if I'm being honest.
translation.it: E forse anche il dessert, a dire il vero.

translation.en: Bonnie, this is your chance!
Escape while they feast on my marbled flesh and gristle!
translation.it: Scappa mentre divorano la mia carne e cartilagine!

translation.en: Carry on the Greive name. Make me proud.
translation.it: Porta avanti il nome dei Greive. Rendimi fiero.

translation.en: No! No! No!
If we don't help you, we're not your field assistants.
translation.it: Se non ti aiutiamo, non siamo assistenti.

translation.en: We're just parasites!
I'm not an Aldrich, or a Bardrich, or a Dietrich.
translation.it: Non sono un Aldrich, un Bardrich o un Dietrich.

translation.en: -No offense, Dietrich. -Oh, none taken.
I have very high self-worth.
I'm breaking rule number one.
I'm still not gonna do anything.
translation.it: Io continuerò a non fare niente.

translation.en: Ooh, sorry!
Ah! I have to admit, that was a brilliant zoological strategy, Bonbon.
translation.it: Devo ammettere che è stata un'ottima strategia zoologica, Bonbon.

translation.en: Thank God I went to an Ivy League school.
translation.it: Ho fatto una scuola della Ivy League.

translation.en: If there's one thing I know how to do, it's kick the creeps where it hurts.
translation.it: Se so fare qualcosa, è prendere a calci gli stronzi dove fa male.

translation.en: -[rustling] -Mountain crocs!
[BTG gasps] A magnificent mountain nyala.
[gasps] The final animal on the parasite census!
Know what, Bonnie? Why don't you take this one?
translation.it: Senti, Bonnie. Perché non te ne occupi tu?

translation.en: No way!
-[Bonnie] Ha-ha! Yes! -Are you sure she can handle this?
[inhales deeply] I'm sure. She's a Greive.
She's a BTG. This is in her blood.
translation.it: È una BTG. Ce l'ha nel sangue.

translation.en: [grunts] Crap!
I'm good.
Attagirl!
[sighing] Ah! I'm gonna be sad when one of you gets killed and eaten.
translation.it: Sarò triste quando uno di voi sarà ucciso e mangiato.

translation.en: Mmm, hopefully in that order.
Oh, Mother.
Even animals that traditionally hunt alone can form unusual symbiotic partnerships…
translation.it: Anche animali che cacciano da soli possono creare relazioni simbiotiche…

translation.en: -[Bonnie] Uncle B. Gold. -…with different species.
-Found your yearbook. -[BTG] Oh, is that gold, really?
translation.it: - Ho trovato il tuo annuario. - Bingo?

translation.en: What were you like in high school?
I was friends with a lot of kids from a lot of different backgrounds.
translation.it: Ero amico di molti ragazzi di diverse origini.

translation.en: And when I started exploring the world, those friendships paid off.
translation.it: E questo mi è tornato utile per esplorare il mondo.

translation.en: I don't care about those people cliques anymore. I'm more of an animal person now.
translation.it: Non mi interessa più la gente. Ora preferisco gli animali.

translation.en: But you gotta remember that, in nature,
animals behave much like we did in high school.
translation.it: gli animali si comportano come noi al liceo.

translation.en: They have their own cliques. Like tortoises--
-[Bonnie] Stoners. -[BTG] Correct.
Yaks? Jocks.
The meathead jocks are the ones in the gym just getting their beef on.
translation.it: Gli atleti stupidi, che si pompano in palestra.

translation.en: -[Bonnie] Yeah. -Wallabies?
-Like the track team? -[Bonnie] Oh, definitely. Porcupines?
translation.it: - Come la squadra di atletica? - Oh, certo. - Gli istrici? - Sono come i vergini incalliti.

translation.en: [BTG] They're like the hardcore super virgins.
translation.it: - Gli istrici? - Sono come i vergini incalliti.

translation.en: -[laughs] He's back! -Scorpions are goths.
translation.it: - Eccolo! - Gli scorpioni sono i goth.

translation.en: -[BTG] Uh-huh. -Tarantulas, emo kids.
-What's the difference? Ah. -Eyeliner.
-Zebra, thespians. -[BTG] Drama club. Yeah.
translation.it: - Le zebre, gli attori. - Club di teatro. Sì.

translation.en: Oh. Vulture?
A really mean principal, and he hates the kids,
translation.it: Un preside molto cattivo che odia i ragazzi,

translation.en: because he hates his life.
-Nature, high school, one and the same. -[Bonnie] Yeah.
translation.it: - Natura, liceo, sono la stessa cosa. - Già.
